email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

We are pleased to offer mv PACIFIC WAVE for your 12,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama.
Rate: USD 42 per MT on CIF basis.
Laycan: 20-25 October.
NYPE terms with demurrage USD 12,000/day.

Kind regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to market rates. Can you revise to USD 38 per MT?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

We can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per MT. Owners are keen on this business and hope this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

USD 40 per MT is still higher than our target. We are seeing rates around USD 37 per MT. Can you match this?

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Final offer: USD 38.50 per MT. This is our best and final rate. Please advise soonest as stem is closing.

Kind regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

USD 38.50 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send the recap.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Kind regards,
Lucas
